title: Dimuth reveals SL playing 11 details
content: Sri Lanka is hoping to play 3 fast bowlers, one spinner, along with 7 batters for the 1st Test against India in Mohali, skipper Dimuth Karunaratne said.Speaking during press briefing today, Sri Lanka skipper also confirmed Niroshan Dickwella will be the wicket-keeper.Sri Lanka Skipper also said that Sri Lanka might rest fast bowler Dushmantha Chameera for the first test considering his workload.
